courses.name: Independent Studies in Christianity and Culture

cmCourseInfo.description: An independent research project to be proposed by the student and supervised by a Christianity and Culture faculty member. Application forms are available from the SMC Principal's Office. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
cmCourseInfo.title: Independent Studies in Christianity and Culture
cmCourseInfo.prerequisitesText: Completion of 4.0 credits and written approval of Program Coordinator and Director

notes.name: Course Note
notes.content:
Timetable Instructions

More information can be found here: https://stmikes.utoronto.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/SMCIndependent_Study_Form_20219.pdf For "E" indicator courses, please contact the SMC Program Administrator, Stephanie Taylor at smc.programs@utoronto.ca (50 St. Joseph Street, Odette Hall, Room 020, St. Michael's College).
